}):compose;export var configureStore=function configureStore(){var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var persistedReducer=persistReducer({key:'rootx',storage:storage,whitelist:[]},reducer,window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__());var store=createStore(persistedReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)));var persistor=persistStore(store);sagaMiddleware.run(mainSaga);return{store:store,persistor:persistor};};
